name: They Bleed Pixels

files.game: N/A:Please select the Humble zip file

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/They Bleed Pixels/They Bleed Pixels PC.exe

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the Humble zip file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/They Bleed Pixels/They Bleed Pixels PC.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $game
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/They Bleed Pixels
    src: $CACHE
